scripts.deploy: npm run build; git add dist -f; git commit -m "Adding dist"; git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
scripts.gen-icons: cd public; inkscape -z -e icon-144x144.png -w 144 -h 144 favicon.svg && inkscape -z -e icon-192x192.png -w 192 -h 192 favicon.svg && inkscape -z -e icon-512x512.png -w 512 -h 512 favicon.svg
